titleInfo.title: ‘Chart of the Coast of Persia from Kooe Mubarrack to Krotchey. Surveyed by Commander G.B. Brucks and Lieut. S.B. Haines H.C. Marine 1829. Engraved by Rd. Bateman, 85 Long Acre’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:268 x 957 mm or smaller, on sheet 665 1000 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:Published by James Horsburgh, Hydrographer to the East India Company.Distinctive Features:Relief shown by hachures. Depth shown by soundings.Chart of the northern coast of the Gulf of Oman compiled from the surveys carried out by the Bombay Marine’s officers between 1820 and 1829 showing the shoreline between Jask and Krotchey [Karachi] with four inset maps drawn to scale 1:125,000 showing the individual bays: ‘Jask Bay’, ‘Chabbar Bay’, ‘Gwetter Bay’ and ‘Gwadel Bay’.Contains annotations on hazardous features including rocks, sand banks and mud areas.
